recommendations: Administer aspirin 75-100mg daily for secondary prevention of cardiovascular events
Recommend statin therapy for patients with LDL cholesterol >190 mg/dL
Screen adults aged 50-75 for colorectal cancer using colonoscopy every 10 years

Return Data.overall_quality: High quality evidence with strong methodological rigor across most recommendations
methodology_notes: Multiple high-quality randomized controlled trials support aspirin recommendation
Large meta-analyses demonstrate clear benefit-risk ratio for statin therapy
Screening recommendation based on systematic reviews with moderate certainty due to indirect evidence
